content.title: Full Medical Checkup Assistance Scheme- Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
content.department: Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat
content.beneficiary: Male Shramyogis above 45 years and female Shram Yogis above 35 years working in the organized sector
content.details: The “Full Medical Checkup Assistance Scheme” is implemented by the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board. The objective of the scheme is to conduct health check-ups for male Shramyogis above 45 years of age and female Shram Yogis above 35 years of age who are working in the organized sector in the state of Gujarat. Only those workers (Shramyogi) whose Labour Welfare Fund has been paid regularly by their organization/unit for the last one year will be eligible.
benefits: Health check-ups for eligible male and female Shramyogis.
Fixed amount of ₹1950/- per worker for complete medical check-ups.
25% of the amount (₹487.50) to be paid by the organization/company.
eligibility: Workers (Shramyogis) whose Labour Welfare Fund has been regularly paid by their organization/unit for the last one year.
Male Shram Yogis above 45 years of age and female Shram Yogis above 35 years of age working in the organized sector.
Benefits will be given once a year to the labourers.
The Gujarat Labour Welfare Board shall not be responsible for any side effects during/after physical examination.
Medical examination must be done within 30 days of receiving in-principle approval.
exclusions: Fees paid under this scheme will not be refunded.
Final decision regarding the scheme will be with the Welfare Commissioner.
content.application_process: Online application through the Sanman Portal.
documents_required: A copy of the identity card issued by the contractor to the worker/labour

faqs.question: Who administers the Shramyogi Full Medical Checkup Assistance Scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is administered by the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board, under the Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective is to provide comprehensive health check-ups for eligible male and female Shram Yogis above certain age thresholds.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme provides health check-ups for eligible male and female workers, with a fixed amount allocated per worker for the complete medical check-up.

faqs.question: How much is the fixed amount for the medical check-up?
faqs.answer: The fixed amount is ₹1950/- per employee, with the organization/company responsible for paying 25% of this amount.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to avail of the benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible workers (Shramyogis) must have their Labour Welfare Fund regularly paid by their organization/unit for the last one year.

faqs.question: How often can a worker avail of the benefit?
faqs.answer: Benefits will be provided once a year to the eligible laborers.

faqs.question: Is the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board liable for any side effects during or after the physical examination?
faqs.answer: No, the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board shall not be responsible for any side effects during or after the physical examination.

faqs.question: What is the timeline for completing the medical examination after receiving in-principle approval?
faqs.answer: The medical examination must be done within 30 days of receiving in-principle approval.

faqs.question: Are the fees paid under this scheme refundable?
faqs.answer: No, fees paid under this scheme will not be refunded.

faqs.question: How can one apply for the scheme benefit?
faqs.answer: Applicants can apply through the Sanman Portal.
